name: sass-pack
description: A simple sass compiler/minifier CLI tool with optional manifest options

scripts.test: npm run clean && tape tests/tests.js | tap-spec
scripts.compile: sass-pack -a tests/multi-level -o tests/outputs/multi -s "tests/multi-level/themes/!(framework)/!(*-email).scss" -e tests/multi-level/themes/**/*-email.scss -f -n compressed -x tests/outputs/multi -m tests/outputs/multi/manifest.json

author: Dustin Hershman
